alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Indian River; Martin; Northern Brevard County; Okeechobee; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Brevard County; Southern Lake County; St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 29 at 2:19AM EST until January 30 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...Orange, Seminole, Southern Brevard, Osceola, Indian River, Okeechobee, St. Lucie, Martin, Coastal Volusia, Southern Lake and Northern Brevard Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Normally colder spots in rural northwest Orange County, as well as northern Okeechobee and southern Osceola Counties will approach hard freeze conditions with lows briefly dropping to 26 or 27 degrees right around sunrise.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Indian River; Martin; Northern Brevard County; Okeechobee; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Brevard County; Southern Lake County; St. Lucie
